ygData.subject: Re: CORFLUNK QUEST
ygData.msgSnippet: Shock of lightning starts at 78, and gains 1 hp dmg per lvl you go up.. until 84 I think.  At lvl 16 lightning bolt does a max dmg of 117.  I don t think that
ygData.messageBody:
Shock of lightning starts at 78, and gains 1 hp dmg per lvl you go up..
until 84 I think. At lvl 16 lightning bolt does a max dmg of 117. I don't
think that goes up with lvl gain.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: Eric Rolnicki <the_legion__@...>

>From: "Eric Rolnicki" <the_legion__@...>

>how much damage does your shock of lightning deal? mine only deals 78
